title: Breakingviews TV: Polishing P
text:
Breakingviews TV: Polishing P&G 5:43pm GMT - 03:37 
Lauren Silva Laughlin and Richard Beales assess how activist investor Nelson Peltz’s coffee-mug mantra, “sales up, expenses down,” applies to the $230 billion Procter & Gamble, and what more radical options there may be for the company.
